trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> event of a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理序列化 (Serialization) 管理員的 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to resolve object names during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 此委派由<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>序列化和還原序列化期間解析物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example attaches a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName> event of a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ResolveNameEventHandler>至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName>指定的事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>。
